body_html:
All of the bash files under here are on their way out. @case540 is working on removing those.
If you like to check in CI scripts, I recommend creating standalone scripts that do not need any flags under tools/ci_build/linux/mkl

body:
All of the bash files under here are on their way out. @case540 is working on removing those.
If you like to check in CI scripts, I recommend creating standalone scripts that do not need any flags under `tools/ci_build/linux/mkl`
